name: Devil Island
summary: Devil Island is an action game for the Game Boy Color. It is alternately known as Devil Land, 惡魔城2 月風魔篇 (Castlevania 2: Record of Getsu Fūma), 魔戒博詵 (Lord of the Rings), and 魔戒3-不完美的世界 (Lord of the Rings 3: Imperfect World). The text is completely in Chinese, and no English translation is known to exist.
